original_title: Stephen Miller Calls Democrat Party an “Extremist Organization”, Says “Evil” Sanctuary City Mayors Still Defying ICE Detainers and “Now They Face Potential Criminal Charges for Harboring and Smuggling”  — The Donald
article_summary: White House Deputy Chief of Staff Stephen Miller calls out Democratic Party as an "extremist organization" and threatens potential criminal charges for sanctuary city mayors defying ICE detainers. Online commentators express support for legal action against these officials.</s>
